articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Iran abandons nuclear deal after killing of general
articles.description: Did pulling out of the Iran nuclear deal make us - and the world more safe? Doctor Jeffrey Lewis, director of the East Asia non-proliferation program at the Middlebury Institute of International Studies.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Pentagon denies draw-down of U.S. troops from Iraq
articles.description: A memo provided to Iraqis meant that there will be movement both in and out of the country, Courtney Kube reports.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Trump says U.S troops won't leave unless Iraq pays for air base
articles.description: Killing General Soleimani was the most extreme of many options the Pentagon offered President Trump. Retired Four Star General Barry McCaffrey and Mark Jacobson, who was Former Senior Advisor to Defense Secretary Ash Carter join Katy Tur to discuss.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Monday's Mini-Report, 1.6.20
articles.content:
Today’s edition of quick hits:
* A war-like mobilization response to Australia’s fires: With more than a month still to go in the fire season, the government announced on Saturday a large-scale use of military assets, a deployment not seen since World War II… [+2159 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Trump threatens to strike Iranian cultural sites
articles.description: President Trump repeats threats to strike Iranian cultural sites in the frenzied aftermath of the killing of General Qassem Soleimani

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Cardin: 'Don't know' where votes are for Bolton to testify
articles.description: Sen. Ben Cardin (D-Md.) discusses the possibility of John Bolton testifying in the impeachment trial.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: So, What’d I Miss?
articles.description: A look back at the four dizzying months in the world of politics while NBC’s Kasie Hunt was on parental leave

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: John Bolton willing to testify in Trump impeachment trial
articles.description: Former National Security Adviser John Bolton has been described as a key witness to the allegations of a quid pro quo with Ukraine. Javed Ali, former Senior Director for Counterterrorism on the National Security Council, joins Ali Velshi to discuss the signif…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Out of Office: Why leave is critical for new parents and how nation can do better
articles.description: After 4 months on parental leave NBC’s Kasie Hunt discusses the issues new mothers face and why the United States lags much of the western world

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: John Bolton willing to testify in the impeachment trial if subpoenaed
articles.description: Former National Security Advisor John Bolton said in a letter today that he will testify in a Senate impeachment trial if he is issued a subpoena

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Fmr. Energy Secy. Ernest Moniz: Iran Deal Can Stand on its Own
articles.description: The Iranian government announced it would abandon the landmark 2015 nuclear deal preventing them from developing nuclear weapons. The decision presents a huge setback to the region's stability and undercuts the intense effort to make the deal possible. Ernest…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: What happens now that Qassem Soleimani is gone?
articles.description: Ali Velshi talks about what comes next in this new round of tensions between the U.S. and Iran with Norman Roule, a retired CIA officer who oversaw national intelligence policy related to Iran.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: How the U.S. should respond to the threat from Iran
articles.description: Ali Velshi talks with Javed Ali, a former Senior Director for Counterterrorism at the National Security Council, about the different ways that Iran could retaliate for the air strike that killed Gen. Qassem Soleimani.
